name: Prime Collateralised Securities (PCS) UK Limited
goal: We are a not for profit initiative set up by stakeholders in the finance industry (both investors and issuers and other market participants) with the mission to assist in reviving a strong but safe securitisation market in Europe for the benefit of the European economy.  This is done, inter alia, through the issuance of a quality label to securitisations that meet our strict quality criteria.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Internal Market
euInitiatives:
Capital Markets Union
Securitisation
SME financing
Bank capital
Insurance regulation
